messages.content: ComfyUI-CCSR is a simple wrapper node for the CCSR upscaler model, allowing it to be used within the ComfyUI interface for image upscaling.
Where can the CCSR models for ComfyUI-CCSR be downloaded?
The CCSR models for ComfyUI-CCSR are available in safetensors format on the Hugging Face website at https://huggingface.co/Kijai/ccsr-safetensors/tree/main.
What is the default precision used for the CCSR models in ComfyUI-CCSR?
By default, the CCSR models in ComfyUI-CCSR use fp16 precision.
Is there a new node in ComfyUI-CCSR that automatically downloads the CCSR models?
Yes, there is a new node in ComfyUI-CCSR that automatically downloads the CCSR models, and the downloaded models are stored in the 'ComfyUI/models/CCSR' directory.
How has the model loading process been improved in the updated version of ComfyUI-CCSR?
In the updated version of ComfyUI-CCSR, model loading is twice as fast as before, and memory usage has been reduced.
Is the original ComfyUI-CCSR node still available for use?
Yes, the original ComfyUI-CCSR node, which simply selects models from the 'checkpoints' folder, is still available for backwards compatibility.
What is the recommended method for installing ComfyUI-CCSR?
It is recommended to install ComfyUI-CCSR using the ComfyUI-Manager extension.
